title: Replace 'Moritz Care Home' branding text with 'Maui Lane Care Home'

requirements.text: Replace all user-facing occurrences of the exact text "Moritz Care Home" with "Maui Lane Care Home" across the frontend UI, including the resident print report header and the reference capture page copy.

quotes: change Moritz Care Home to Maui Lane Care Home

acceptanceCriteria: The print-only Resident Profile Report header shows "Maui Lane Care Home" instead of "Moritz Care Home" (frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/ResidentProfilePrintReport.tsx).
The references page no longer displays the string "Moritz Care Home" anywhere in its visible title/body text (frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzReferenceCapture.tsx).
A global search over frontend source text confirms there are no remaining user-facing occurrences of the exact string "Moritz Care Home".

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change routing, authentication behavior, or any backend canister code.
Do not redesign the UI or update branding assets (logo/icon/hero) beyond text replacement.
